categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of Darth Krayt's Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Shantillen served as a captain in the Navy of Darth Krayt's Galactic Empire at the time of the Second Imperial Civil War. By 137 ABY, Shantillen was stationed aboard the Ardent-class fast frigate Marauder and was assigned to the First Coruscant Task Force, as the second in command to Admiral Krion Grail.
